entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
